name: Cave hunter
description:
This game was created for the 8x8 game jam 2.

gameplay: 

You play as a cave hunter. Hunt bats and sell their wings. Search for treasures and try not to die from poisonous snakes. Explore procedurally generated caves. Buy and sell different things in the store.

control: 

Q - inventory 

WASD - move 

Left click - shooting

NEW UPDATE:

 Users( Cian Moriarty,  CrazyYarick and sighet_someone ) recommended adding new features, I did it. 

 Added: increased accuracy of the gun and a laser sight. They can be purchased in the   game store.
